    MazeGenerator - Class in projatlab.algorithms.generators
    Abstract class for maze generators.
    MazeGenerator() - Constructor for class projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGenerator
     
    MazeGeneratorDFS - Class in projatlab.algorithms.generators
    MazeGeneratorDFS is a maze generation algorithm that uses Depth-First Search (DFS) to generate a random maze.
    MazeGeneratorDFS(Maze, long, Boolean) - Constructor for class projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGeneratorDFS
    Constructs a MazeGeneratorDFS instance.
    MazeGeneratorKruskal - Class in projatlab.algorithms.generators
    Maze generator using Kruskal's algorithm using Union-Find data structure It starts with each cell as an individual set and removes walls between randoms adjacent cells that belong to different sets, forming a minimum spanning tree
    MazeGeneratorKruskal(Maze, long, Boolean) - Constructor for class projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGeneratorKruskal
    Constructs a maze with the Kruskal generator and a seed
    MazeGeneratorPrim - Class in projatlab.algorithms.generators
    Implements Prim's algorithm Starts from a random cell, connects it to a visted neighbor and adds its unvisited neigbors to the frontier
    MazeGeneratorPrim(Maze, long, Boolean) - Constructor for class projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGeneratorPrim
    Constructs a maze with the Prim generator and a seed
    MazeView - Class in projatlab.view
    MazeView is a JavaFX component that visually represents a maze on a canvas.
    MazeView(Maze) - Constructor for class projatlab.view.MazeView
